reviews.review: He jugado un par de horillas y bueno, al principio esta divertido sobre todo con amigos y eso, pero a la larga se hace ultra repetitivo porque solo tiene un modo de juego, ya sea de killer o survivor, solo hay un modo. La toxicidad de este juego supera limites establecidos por League of Legends y Valorant entre otros, donde todo el mundo se cree el mejor y con la razon hagan lo que hagan. El juego siempre va a estar roto porque habra varios killers que sean OP, como Nurse, Blight o Spirit, y otros que sean una broma, y los survivors van 90% con 4 perks de meta y asi todas las partidas iguales. He jugado mucho en ambos bandos, y ambos se me terminaron haciendo super aburridos. Por si no estaba ya claro con lo que te sajan con cada cosmetico del juego y cada dlc, recientemente ha salido a la luz que la compañia tiene interes por manejar temas de NFTs, hace ya unos meses que desintalé el juego y no veo razón ninguna para volver. Una pena porque era un juego con muchisimo potencial, pero se volvió increiblemente repetitivo, aburrido y previsible. Espero con ansias que salga VHS, es mucho mas prometedor en todos los sentidos.

Хорошая игра поиграл немного конечно но следил за ней полтора года на ютубе и реально хорошая игрулька!

Love hunting my friends for sport!
Great game with friends. Give it a chance and learn how to play. Ton of fun. When not with friends play as the killer.
游戏还是不错的  制作组也很重视玩家

Game used to be fun, but way too many changes going in the wrong direction.

The challenge tomes are not challenging or fun and just result in some survivors and killers focusing on completing just that task and nothing else.  Some survivors will intentionally die on the first hook to move on to the next challenge faster, and some killers will just stand around so you can finish faster once theirs is done.

I would go on, but the game just isn't worth more of my time anymore.

My Favorite Game so Far
Amazing <3

It's really fun, both as a killer and a survivor. The tension of trying to stay alive is really good, and so is the stress of trying to hunt down your prey. This game actually made me jump quite a bit, which I was not expecting when I started playing!
This game B.A. sometimes not all times.
it is a very fun online game to play with others no story needed to enjoy :)
The core gameplay is fun but like the game itself is riddled with a lot of problems that the devs refuse to fix theres also a ton of early game grinding but overall still pretty fun
this is a very good game killer designs are very good it has some good dlcs and very good to play with friends i highly recommend

Good assymetrical multiplayer horror game. Don't buy dlc and shit unless it's on DLC and you *really* want it though, this game's DLC market is atrocious. Tons of several dollar cosmetics, battle pass, tons of paid dlc characters (I understand licensed characters need to be paid, but your own original characters that are tied to in game challenges and achievements are paid? What?). You can unlock the original characters via in game currency called shards. There's also in game currency called auric cells, which are real money. Don't buy those. It's a very good game, just don't take it too seriously. There are some toxic players, just report them and move on. Don't feed the trolls.
Survivors are pretty toxic but at the end of the day , the killer community has my back :)
